summary: The life of a respected minister and loving family man shatters after his daughter is kidnapped. When she is not returned, he renounces God and becomes a corrupt businessman.
cast: Myung-Min Kim|Ki-joon Uhm|Joo-mi Park|Kim So-Hyun|Byung-Joon Lee|Ho-jae Lee|Seo-hyun Ahn|Eung-soo Kim|Oh Kwang-rok|Hyeon-jong Sin
title: Pa-gwi-dwin sa-na-i
